pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 12, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Leader of the Official Opposition, the Honourable Andrew Scheer.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Saskatchewan, the Honourable Scott Moe.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
